name: prune tagine
steps: Prepare the marinade: Mix the spices, oil, salt, and honey. Coat the meat with this mixture. Let marinate (at least 30 minutes in the fridge).
Peel and slice the onions. Cut the accompanying vegetables (carrots, zucchini if used) into cubes.
Place the onions at the bottom of the tagine dish. Add the vegetables (if used) and the prunes, then top with the meat. Cover with water (about 1 liter).
Bring to a boil over high heat. Lower the heat and let cook for at least 2.5 hours covered (until the meat is tender).
Meanwhile, toast the almonds and sesame seeds in a dry pan.
Add the almonds and sesame seeds 15 minutes before the end of cooking. Adjust the seasoning.
